name: J.K. Rowling
bio: British author, best known for the Harry Potter series.

name: George R.R. Martin
bio: American novelist and short story writer, known for A Song of Ice and Fire.

name: J.R.R. Tolkien
bio: English writer, best known for The Hobbit and The Lord of the Rings.

name: Agatha Christie
bio: English writer known for her detective novels, particularly those featuring Hercule Poirot and Miss Marple.

name: Isaac Asimov
bio: American author and professor of biochemistry, known for his works of science fiction and popular science.

name: Stephen King
bio: American author of horror, supernatural fiction, suspense, and fantasy novels.

name: Mark Twain
bio: American writer, humorist, entrepreneur, and publisher, known for The Adventures of Tom Sawyer and Adventures of Huckleberry Finn.

name: Jane Austen
bio: English novelist known for her six major novels including Pride and Prejudice and Sense and Sensibility.

name: F. Scott Fitzgerald
bio: American novelist and short story writer, known for The Great Gatsby.

name: Harper Lee
bio: American novelist best known for her novel To Kill a Mockingbird.
